entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow Grains, 5.6°C

Observed at: Princeton Airport 2:24 PM PDT Friday 24 March 2023

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 35 %

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers early this evening. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Friday 24 March 2023
